data.name: Pirate Pop Plus Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Ahoy matey! This is the official, bubble-poppin', heart-stoppin', beat-droppin' soundtrack to Pirate Pop Plus! Join Pete Jr. as he blasts his way through 10 treasure-filled tracks by Harry Waters, Matthew Ivic, gyms, and Dan Rodrigues, each one sure to get your bubble butt moving!

Track Listing:

1. Harry Waters - Analogue 00:18
2. Harry Waters - Ahoy 02:25
3. Dan Rodrigues - Avast 03:06
4. Matthew Ivic - Aye! 03:28
5. gyms - Anchor 02:53
6. Matthew Ivic - Barnacles 03:32
7. Dan Rodrigues - Bananas 02:33
8. gyms - Blazing 03:11
9. Harry Waters - Blast 02:51
10. Harry Waters & Matthew Ivic - Begone 00:59


Tracks 1, 2, 9, and 10 - Harry Waters
Tracks 3 and 7 - Dan Rodrigues
Tracks 4 and 6 - Matthew Ivic
Tracks 5 and 8 - gyms

Produced by Hawken King
Mastered by Marcus Huyskens
Album artwork by Justin Chan, Layout by Aaron Kwapisinski
